channel.title: Open this if you have trouble with your compiler!
channel.description:
If your compiler does not compile, or tells you "you do not have jdk 5.0 or 6.0", right click on your "compile&run" file and click "edit", then erase everything and replace it with this:
[code]@echo off title JorzaScape Server compile+restaRTer tskill java /a javac *.java java -cp .;./jython.jar server [/code]
this compiles the server and runs it, try it, it should 100% work!

item.title: Open this if you have trouble with your compiler!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Or you can just replace run.bat with this:

javac *.java
pause

That way, unless you have classes in separate folders or you are using libraries, it will compile it and the only errors will be from the classes.

Read full topic
item.source: Open this if you have trouble with your compiler!
